thread.title: A mouldy experience
thread.title_full: A mouldy experience - Review of Holiday Inn Express London City, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Boris A
title: A mouldy experience
text:
The service in this place is fine, although the breakfast area under the umbrella term "Express Start" quite rightly didn't bode well.
Unfortunately, I found that my room was a major let-down. Desk and chair were disproportionate to each other, making longer work sessions impossible despite the good WiFi the hotel offers. The real shock came when I wanted to take a shower: There was so much mould around the tiles and the ceiling that it made me wheeze, and I usually don't suffer from sensitivity. That bad.
